meanings.definition: Semiabstraction: the representation of a subject in a simplified or abstract form
meanings.sent1: The semiabstraction of the tree in the painting made it look like a colorful shape.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use semiabstraction to create unique interpretations of everyday objects.
meanings.sent3: The semiabstraction of the cat in the artwork made it seem like a playful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her semiabstraction of emotions through colors was both intriguing and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent5: The semiabstraction of the landscape brought a sense of mystery and wonder to the viewer.

meanings.definition: Semiabstraction: a style of art that combines elements of abstraction and representation
meanings.sent1: The museum featured a collection of semiabstraction artworks that blurred the lines between reality and imagination.
meanings.sent2: Many artists experiment with semiabstraction to push the boundaries of traditional art forms.
meanings.sent3: The semiabstraction of the city skyline in the painting gave it a dreamlike quality.
meanings.sent4: His use of semiabstraction in depicting human figures added a layer of complexity to his art.
meanings.sent5: The semiabstraction of nature in her paintings captured the essence of beauty in a unique way.
